DOC.brief_summary: Bioequivalence study to confirm that a NTS with a polyisobutylene (PIB) adhesive from an alternative supplier delivers the same nicotine blood profile as that of the currently approved NTS with a polyisobutylene adhesive from the current supplier.
DOC.brief_title: A Pharmacokinetic Evaluation of Two Nicotine Patches in Smokers
DOC.criteria: BMI 1927 kg/m2 smokes >10 cigarettes per day for preceeding 6 months inability to stop smoking during study
